description: Job description: The Department of National Defence is looking for a senior project manager to provide support to the Aerospace Engineering Test Establishment team.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: One (1) Senior Project Manager Position

#### Tender Details

* **Contract Title**: One (1) Project Manager, Senior
* **Reference Number**: cb-348-43049695-1
* **Publication Date**: March 8, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: March 25, 2024, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)
* **Expected Contract Start and End Dates**: April 1, 2024 - March 31, 2027
* **Tender Status**: Expired

#### Description

The Department of National Defence is seeking the services of one (1) Senior Project Manager to provide support to the Aerospace Engineering Test Establishment team. The contractor will be responsible for managing and coordinating various projects, developing project plans, and ensuring successful project execution.

The expected duration of this contract is one (1) year, with two (2) additional one-year options.
#### Requirements

* One (1) Senior Project Manager with experience in project management and coordination
* Ability to work independently and collaboratively as part of a team
* Strong communication and problem-solving skills
* Proficiency in project management tools and software

#### Terms and Conditions

* The Contractor shall have a security clearance level of Secret.
* The Contractor shall have a security clearance for document safeguarding.
* The Contractor shall comply with the requirements of the Task and Solutions Based Professional Services (TSPS) method.

#### Suppliers Eligibility

* This tender is open only to the following pre-qualified suppliers under the stated consultant categories, level of expertise, security level, region, and tier:
	+ 50 suppliers from the list of pre-qualified services contractors

#### Contact Information

* Point of Contact: Tony Seng
* Email: tony.seng@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (819) 939-4148
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2

#### Supply Arrangement Type

* Task and Solutions Based Professional Services (TSPS)

#### Method of Supply

* Competitive

#### Notice of Proposed Procurement

* The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the services of one (1) Project Manager, Senior, to provide support to the Aerospace Engineering Test Establishment team.

#### Procurement Category

* SRV

#### Procurement Method

* Competitive - Traditional

#### Notice Type

* RFP against Supply Arrangement
